IllegalThrows.description:
Description

Checks that specified types are not declared to be thrown.
Declaring that a method throws java.lang.Error or
java.lang.RuntimeException is almost never acceptable.
IllegalThrows.option:
ignoreOverriddenMethods, Allow to ignore checking overridden methods (marked with Override or java.lang.Override annotation)., boolean, true
ignoredMethodNames, Specify names of methods to ignore., String[], finalize
illegalClassNames, Specify throw class names to reject., String[], Error, RuntimeException, Throwable, java.lang.Error, java.lang.RuntimeException, java.lang.Throwable
